description: This file implements a platform-independent utility function for creating a Slap Var Helper object in the SLAP (Service Logic Aggregation Plane) environment. It includes licensing and copyright information, comments describing the module, and a single function `SlapCreateVarHelper` that calls another creator function.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapCreateVarHelper(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates a new Slap Var Helper object using the internal function `SlapVhoCreate`. It takes container, owner, and reserved context handles as parameters and returns a handle to the created object.
